entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Source code compiled into `runtime.native.*` NuGet packages #105732
  • Name parsing in System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive #105729
  • HttpClient With Proxy did not handle the Proxy 407 auth flow on Linux OS #105724
  • JIT SVE: Assertion failed '!m_VariableLiveRanges->back().m_EndEmitLocation.Valid()' during 'Generate code' #105723
    9.0.0
  • JIT SVE: Invalid result with `Sve.TestFirstTrue` #105721
    9.0.0
  • JIT SVE: Assertion failed 'insOptsScalableWide(opt)' during 'Generate code' #105720
    9.0.0
  • JIT SVE: Assertion failed 'isVectorRegister(reg4)' during 'Generate code' #105719
    9.0.0
  • [Analyzer Proposal]: Replace `.Where(x => x is T)` for `.OfType<T>()` #105718
  • System.Net.Security.Tests assertion failure: !newKey.IsInvalid #105715
  • Identification of JIT generated functions by their address #105712
  • Access violation in CEEInfo::getCallInfo #105710
  • Seg fault in Linq.Expression tests #105706
  • `System.Linq.Expressions.Tests.WorkItemExecution` fails with access violation #105704
  • Arm64/Sve: Remove HW_Flag_HasEnumOperand #105702
    9.0.0
  • [mono] [iOS] Cumulative Mono iOS HelloWorld size regressions from .NET 9 #105701
    9.0.0
  • Forward StatusCode to HttpRequestException whenever possible #105700
    10.0.0
  • Add debugger display to CancellationTokenSource #105698
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'estimatedSize >= actualSize' during 'Emit code' #105693
    9.0.0
  • Quality of native perf profiling on x64 #105690
  • [apple] Failure in System.Net.Sockets.Tests: "Too many open files in system" #105688
  • [RISCV,QEMU] On QEMU reading from /proc/pid/stat file returns strange values #105686
    Future
  • Deadlock in System.Diagnostics.Tracing.FrameworkEventSource on application startup #105682
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: Regression in System.Buffers.Text.Tests.Base64EncodeDecodeInPlaceTests #105707
  • Assertion failed 'OperIs(GT_LCL_VAR, GT_LCL_FLD, GT_PHI_ARG, GT_STORE_LCL_VAR, GT_STORE_LCL_FLD, GT_LCL_ADDR)' during 'Assertion prop' #105670
    9.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'tree->OperIs(GT_LCL_VAR)' during 'Mark local vars' #105669
    9.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'm_stacks != nullptr' during 'SSA: insert phis' #105667
    9.0.0

Closed

  • UdpClient set `ExclusiveAddressUse` fail #105056
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add `Bind` To `UdpClient` #105060
    Future
  • [Android] Android x86 emulator failures in System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource runtime metrics #105203
    9.0.0
  • [apple] Mobile failures in `System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource` runtime metrics #105202
    9.0.0
  • [Apple] New Environment.CpuUsage tests failing on Apple mobile #105322
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Incorrect constant folding of `SubtractScalar`/`MultiplyExtended` #105716
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] net7.0 debugger tests timing out. #101075
    Future
  • JIT: `Bmi.X64.ZeroHighBits` reorders side effects illegally #105683
    9.0.0
  • When publishing from cli not working #105725
  • [Tracking] Mono support for InlineArrayAttribute #80798
    Future
  • Expression.Bind parameter validation is incorrect. #82850
  • Improving Arm64 Performance in .NET 9.0 #94464
    9.0.0
  • static Resize method in the System. Array.cs creates a new array instance even if the new size is 0. #103535
  • Exception when mapping nested collection with Mapster #81029
  • AssemblyNameInfo.FullName does not include public key #102051
    9.0.0
  • EnableDynamicLoading causes multiple loading of assemblies at runtime #104981
  • The `ICorProfilerInfo::GetModuleMetaData` function returns `CORPROF_E_UNSUPPORTED_CALL_SEQUENCE`, while another approach with `IMetaDataDispenserEx` works #105603
    10.0.0
  • EventLogRecord.TaskDisplayName throws System.AccessViolationException and termintates the program #100198
    9.0.0
  • wasm-tools emscripten has duplicated large libraries #70743
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] Build `dotnet/runtime` and `dotnet/runtime` dependencies using `dotnet/emsdk` packages #81309
    9.0.0
  • mono library eglib function offsetof error with 'src/mono/mono/eglib/glib.h' #90210
    9.0.0
  • Do I need to use IHostApplicationLifetime in timed background service #105564
  • JIT: SVE Cleanup - Remove newlines in `System.Runtime.Intrinsics.cs` #104833
    9.0.0
  • JIT: SVE Cleanup - Remove unneeded comments from API surface area #104846
    9.0.0
  • [mono] iOS HelloWorld size regressions (13 Regressions on 4/9/2024 8:55:31 AM) #100975
    9.0.0
  • [mono] iOS HelloWorld size regression on 4/21/2024 8:01:16 AM #101488
    9.0.0
  • [mono][perf] iOS disk size regression on 3 Oct 2023 #93072
    Future
  • [iOS][Perf] iOS HelloWorld size regressions on 7/12/2024 8:02:23 AM #104952
    9.0.0
  • [mono][Perf] iOS HelloWorld size 13 Regressions on 5/17/2024 7:57:45 AM #104073
    9.0.0
  • [mono][aot] Use compile restart to emit a placeholder method body #92688
    Future
  • [mono][aot] Improve toolchain configuration in Mono AOT compiler #93052
    Future
  • Random failure on perf pipeline: `SecurityException: Invalid assembly public key.` #72385
    9.0.0
  • [infra] Exclude 0-test groups to reduce the number of machines allocated on Helix #98213
    9.0.0
  • Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.Specification.Tests is missing API documentation #87709
    10.0.0
  • [mono][aot] Optimize stack unwind data for exception handling #82938
    Future
  • [mono][aot] Remove method body for inlined methods #82907
    Future
  • Mono AOT full program analyses and interprocedural optimizations #80942
    Future
  • Cannot use Blazor 8 RC1 wasm on GitHub pages #93017
    9.0.0
  • [mono][wasi] Set the minimal set of FeatureFlags by default #94805
    9.0.0
  • Missing .yml dependency in Mono llvmaot Pri0 Runtime Tests job #57645
    Future
  • [MONO] Add AOT compiler to desktop runtime pack #48927
    Future
  • [Blazor WASM] Unable to run method 'void BuildRenderTreeMicrosoft.AspNetCore.Components.Rendering.RenderTreeBuilder)': locals size too big. #76808
    9.0.0
  • [browser] Update runtime's DevServer to match Blazor's updates in 9 #105025
    9.0.0
  • HTTP/SSL stress Linux builds broken by PGO update #105560
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 2 Regressions in Regex on 7/11/2024 6:16:28 PM #104975
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: test #105678
  • ` System.Text.Json` support serialization on `System.Numerics.Vector3` `ValueTupe` type #105675
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 20 Regressions on 6/20/2024 7:04:47 AM #104022
    9.0.0
  • Investigate improving JIT heuristics with machine learning #92915
    Future
  • JIT struct work planned for .NET 9 #93105
    9.0.0
  • Improve JIT loop optimizations (.NET 9) #93144
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Overload ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull #105644

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: Fixed assertion on IsUnusedValue when creating ConditionalSelect nodes around SVE methods #105730
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix problem in ReadyToRun_TypeGenericInfoMap::HasConstraints #105728
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • [wasm] Condition dwarfdebug on WasmNativeDebugSymbols #105727
    area-Build-mono
  • JIT: Skip `GT_LCL_FLD` stress if `GTF_VAR_CONTEXT` is set #105726
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ILLink: Keep parameter names unless DebuggerSupport is disabled #105714
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [mono] Heap snapshot system for WASM #105713
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono
  • Fix JitStackChecks failures #105711
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [browser] http streaming request server error #105709
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Add missing tests for LoadVector*() #105703
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add timeout to QuicConnectionTests for StreamsAvailable tests #105699
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • JIT: Check for potential store-to-load forwarding before reordering ldr -> ldp #105695
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V,QEMU] Disable execution of two corefx tests on QEMU #105689
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Make Half max precision test culture-invariant #105685
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] show progress in problematic unit tests #105680
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: add missing test coverage for invalid immediate #105677
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] Fix the arithmetic shift right in CodeGen::genSaveCalleeSavedRegistersHelp. #105676
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [LoongArch64] Fix the add overflow check for A=A+A. #105674
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [DRAFT] Add Keep-Alive Ping and Timeout implementation #105672
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Convert exception throwing JIT helpers to managed code. #105671
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix flaky tests in WindowsServiceLifetimeTests #105666
    area-Extensions-Hosting

Merged

  • Update runtime metrics tests to avoid failures on some platforms #105300
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution
  • Update Preview/Experimental Attributes in Intrinsics #105579
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, 9.0.0
  • Fix CPU usage tests on mobile platforms #105722
    area-System.Runtime, 9.0.0
  • [PERF] Remove runs for experiment rlcse #105731
    area-Infrastructure
  • Exclude dependabot from community-contribution labeling #101742
    area-Meta
  • Ensure we don't fold scalar operations where only one input is constant #105717
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Spill side effects for BMI intrinsics #105687
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove unnecessary `FileLoadLevel` values #105673
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Ensure that embedded broadcast is correctly checking for EVEX support before use #105659
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.9
  • SPMI: Increase superpmi-collect build timeout #105708
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • AssemblyNameInfo.FullName should contain PublicKey #105649
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, 9.0.0
  • Disable generator tests on big-endian #105485
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 9.0.0
  • Workaround bug in EvtFormatMessage #105636
    area-System.Diagnostics.EventLog
  • ARM64-SVE: Fix Comment group headers in SVE API (#104846) #105679
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • [mono] Remove incorrect offsetof definition that shouldn't be needed #105646
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • ARM64-SVE: Remove new lines in System.Runtime.Intrinsics.cs (#104833) #105681
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Update Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.Specification.Tests.c… #105502
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Disable more flaky FSW tests for Windows #105638
    area-System.IO, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Update runtime's DevServer to match Blazor's updates in 9 #105554
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [Http/SslStress] Update linux container centos-stream9 #105631
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Remove some overhead from SymbolicRegexMatcher #105668
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 9.0.0
  • Enable CertificateCallbackThrowPropagates on Alpine #105489
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [NRBF] Fix XML docs #105632
    documentation, area-System.Formats.Nrbf
  • Set GCStressIncompatible on GenericContext test #105645
    GCStress
  • Rename `cdac_offsets` to `cdac_data` #105657
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Delete ROUND JIT helpers that are no longer used #105656
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove fallthrough constraint for `BBJ_SWITCH -> BBJ_COND` conversion #105651
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource] Support listening to meters out-of-proc using a wildcard #105581
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution, 9.0.0

Updated

  • Automatically export '__managed__Main' when needed #105353
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2505827 #105050
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Enhance the bound generator concept to remove duplicate parameters and make it more pervasive throughout the system #105597
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Implement basic (recommended against) support for inheriting from COM interfaces defined in different assemblies #105119
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Haiku: Add Haiku support for CoreCLR/PAL #93907
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, os-haiku
  • TransferEncoding chunked testing only if it is last header value #105647
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Respect general-purpose bit flags when decoding ZipArchiveEntry names and comments #103271
    area-System.IO.Compression, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Adjust IP after an AV during an STEP with FEATURE_EMULATE_SINGLESTEP enabled #105633
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • SunOS process and thread support #105403
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-SunOS, community-contribution
  • Error out when struct size is bigger than int.MaxValue #104393
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Arm64/Sve: DelayfreeUses for FMLA should take into account CndSel for RMW #105541
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [wasi] wasi:http + WasiHttpHandler #103752
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • Partial re-revert of #104336. Only JIT fixes are included. #105596
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Cleanup some code under FEATURE_STUBS_AS_IL #104731
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • [TEST] noop change to see if tests are passing #85694
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Implement `IUtf8SpanParsable` on `IPAddress` and `IPNetwork` #102144
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Improve memory utilization in the case of continuous BGC #87715
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix race condition in nongcheap.cpp test #105658
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Implement `IUtf8SpanParsable` on `Guid` #105654
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Update generated ILLink analyzer tests #105643
    linkable-framework, needs-area-label
  • Use correct IL offset when reporting dataflow warnings for return statements #105661
    needs-area-label
  • Fix check for types interesting to dataflow #105642
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Improve the performance of `BigInteger`.`{Max|Min}Magnitude`/`Abs` & fix a edge case of `TryParse` #105570
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • [HTTP] Unobserved exceptions report in stress #105336
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Store status code in exception for ProxyTunnelError #105610
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Re-enable trimming of library tests on Apple mobile #104097
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Remove short branches #105386
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [NO REVIEW] Investigate Http20.AllSocketsHttpHandlerCounters_Success_Recorded #105081
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http
  • JIT: Improve codegen around unsigned comparisons #105593
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [browser] Marshalling of resolved Tasks/promises is not resolved in JS/C# #105464
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [browser][wbt] Fix `InvalidOperationException: There is no currently active test` #105561
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono, os-browser
  • Add ee_alloc_context #104849
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add ee_alloc_context (NativeAOT) #104851
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [RISC-V][LoongArch64] JIT: pass structs according to floating-point calling convention properly #104237
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Bump to updated llvm 19 #105427
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update IncrementingPollingCounter only on Timer thread #105548
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • [WIP] DATAS tuning fixes #105545
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add GC heap hard limit for 32 bit #101024
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Don't run `fgUpdateFlowGraph` after reordering blocks if using RPO-based layout #105652
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [GC] Avoid OOM in large-allocation-only workloads #105521
    area-GC-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • More IR validations in HIR #105630
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-30
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Implement finalization #2240

PullRequests

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Implement automatic finalization #2634
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

Updated

  • Infrastructure for swift entry point demangling #2639
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] add support for building WASI and browser debug & release on Linux #2605
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] support `System.Net.Http.HttpClient` on WASIp2 #2614
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-30
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • SDK 8.0.304 references unpublished version of .NET 6 #42379
  • [NETSDKE2E]With NET9 p7 zip installed, the prompt message "update are available for the..." should not be displayed after installing wasm-tools. #42170
  • CORS policy.AllowAnyHeader() does not appear to work #42424

Updated

  • ToolInstallCommandTests.WhenRunWithRoot is flaky #42346
  • Microsoft.NET.Build.Containers.IntegrationTests are pulling from Docker Hub #42026
  • VMR CI build failures during restore: feed download failed #41590
  • Package reference alias tests are disabled #39172
    Backlog
  • VMR Unified Linux Build Failing #41030
  • .NET Framework build job test failure #40160
  • Darwin Build_Release failure on Helix tests - Tests timing out #40074
  • Test failure - AllWebProjectsRestoreAndBuild fails with Unbalanced Condition for F# MVC templates #40073
  • dotnet-watch tests failing #40006
  • Support acquiring WindowsDesktop targets on-demand in non-Microsoft-built SDKs #42164
  • CLI - `dotnet workload restore` fails on solution if there is a .dcproj for Docker #42394
    9.0.1xx
  • Reduce the amount of work required to build apps for multiple platforms #42344
  • .NET MAUI Not appearing on Visual Studio 2022 Community #40027
  • [NETSDKE2E]Publish blazorwasm project failed with clang.exe-System Error "The code execution cannot proceed because MSVCP140.dll" was not found... #42147
  • [NETSDKE2E][ARM64][intermittent]Get "Fatal error. System.AccessViolationException: Attempted to read or write protected memory. This is often an indication that other memory is corrupt." When running the command quickly. #41588
    10.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • [Main] Re-Bootstrap Source Build to .NET 9.0.100-preview.7.24380.1 #42472
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [main] Update to the final net7 release #42471
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Re-Bootstrap Source Build to .NET 9.0.100-preview.7.24380.1 #42469
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • skip projects that don't support workloads during workload restore #42467
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Enable specifying install search location options for published `apphost` #42455
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Update to the final net7 release #42470
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Refactor artifacts size tests #42447
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update aspire manifest to 8.1.0 #42364
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable package source mapping for workload * commands #42373
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Update .NET 9 p6 to p7 in the table #42332
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Clean up STJ references Fixes #39902 #40645
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #42428
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove the corext overlay packages as they're not used anymore as far as we know #42326
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add xunit configuration to increase test logging #41963
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Area-Watch
  • Remove the install of all runtimes 5.0 and below. #42327
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable tab-completion for nuget package versions #42349
    Area-NuGet, Area-CLI, cli-ux
  • Stop generating precomputed rar cache #42385
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [8.0.1xx] No .deps.json for net472 Container task #42317
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, Area-Containers, Branch Lockdown, 8.0.9
  • Add -pack support for the build CLI so that the zips/msi/packages aren't built by default #42384
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Find baseline workload set in 8.0.100 folder #42435
    Servicing-approved, Area-Workloads, Branch Lockdown, 8.0.9
  • Add analyzer redirecting proposal #42437
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • filter references for satellite assembly generation down to just the primary assemblies #38504
    untriaged, Area-ILLink

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-30
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Champion "Discriminated Unions" #113
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Collection Expressions Next (C#13 and beyond) #7913
  • [Proposal]: Extending patterns to "as" #8210

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Implicitly typed lambdas returning arrays can have unexpected oblivious element nullability #74609
  • Multiple compiler servers running (and consuming CPU) on Linux #74607
  • Implement generic interface method with `allows ref struct` constraint #74605
  • `F1` help for `allows ref struct` constraint #74604
  • Break points in source generated files don't bind. Source code is different from original version #74603
  • Fixing CS7036 (generate constructor based on base class) should give an option to use Primary Constructor #74602
    Backlog
  • This generator is not generating files. But build works fine #74601
  • [LanguageServerHost] InvalidOperationException: `The solution does not contain the specified document.` after renaming file in Visual Studio Code #74600
  • OrganizeDocument: ArgumentException: The specified SnapshotPoint is on a different ITextSnapshot than this SnapshotPoint. #74594
    17.11 P3

Closed

  • Copilot Rename Suggestions: No suggestions for identifiers referenced in methods that touch the end of file #74545

PullRequests

Created

  • Change SyntaxEquivalence.AreEquivalent to use a more appropriate pooling mechanism for the stack it uses to walk trees. #74610
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations during SourceText serialization #74608
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Allow more of Razor to use Roslyn Lsp types #74597
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Remove unsupported servicing branches #74606
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Rename Suggestions: Fix getting of the context string, gracefully handle errors #74564
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce the number of sourcetexts fully recreated from the tree during brace completion enter #74591
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Modify ISyntaxFacts methods to allocate less #74596
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Use the last computed navbar model until we get a new one. #74595
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Update config for 17.12.P1 snap #74592
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Implement remaining span conversions #74420
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Update LSP Protocol Types #73911
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Fix nested nullability of collection expressions #74490
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix interceptors bugs involving ref this parameters #74363
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Parse `field` as a contextual keyword #73947
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix symbol info in identifier name in object initializer #74582
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Reduce Roslyn packages impact on UI thread #74501
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Fix primary ctor param in static context #74580
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • [C#] Make interpolated strings including string or char constants as optimized as `+` operator (for string type) #72308
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Blazor] negotiateVersion (SignalR) best practice in regards to XSS #57091
  • Consumes attribute/filter in controller-based web app does not set MIME type with the value specified #57090

  • Encoding field of multipart/form-data body is incorrect #57083

  • Issue with key type mismatch in Identity tables after changing to GUID #57080

  • Perf improvement: fortunes #57074

  • Perf improvement: connectionclose #57046

    9.0-rc1

PullRequests

Created

  • Upgrade yarn dependencies #57092

Merged

Updated

    area-mvc
  • Fix up nullability and form schema handling in OpenAPI #56957

  • Use BaseTypeInfo API to fix up polymorphic schemas #56908

  • Add some HPackDecoderTests for empty header names and values #57032

  • Remove unsafe from PathNormalizer #56805
